data.name: Master.CommandText
data.value: SELECT OPOORDER2_M.*,A.CORPSHORTNAME,A.TEL1 ,B.PERSONCNAME,C.WARECNAME,C.WAREENAME ,D.DEPARTMENTCNAME,D.DEPARTMENTENAME,E.CURRENCYCNAME,E.CURRENCYENAME,F.TAILDESC,G.TAILDESC TAILDESC_G ,H.PERSONCNAME SIGNUSERCNAME,I.PROJ_CNAME,I.PROJ_ENAME,J.SHIPMARKNAME,J.MAINMARK_DOC,J.MAINMARK,J.SIDEMARK_DOC,J.SIDEMARK,J.MEMOCHAR,CASE WHEN ISNULL(OPOORDER2_M.SIGN_USER,'')='' THEN '待審核' ELSE '已審核' END SIGN_STATUS FROM OPOORDER2_M LEFT JOIN BASCUSTOMER A ON OPOORDER2_M.CUSTID = A.CUSTID LEFT JOIN BASPERSON B ON OPOORDER2_M.PERSONID = B.PERSONID LEFT JOIN BASWAREHOUSE C ON OPOORDER2_M.WAREID = C.WAREID LEFT JOIN BASDEPARTMENT D ON OPOORDER2_M.DEPARTMENTID = D.DEPARTMENTID LEFT JOIN BASCURRENCY E ON OPOORDER2_M.CURRENCYID = E.CURRENCYID LEFT JOIN COMHEADDOC F ON OPOORDER2_M.BILLHEADNO = F.TAILID LEFT JOIN COMTAILDOC G ON OPOORDER2_M.BILLTAILNO = G.TAILID LEFT JOIN BASPERSON H ON OPOORDER2_M.SIGN_USER = H.PERSONID LEFT JOIN PMSPROJECT I ON OPOORDER2_M.PROJECTID = I.PROJECTID LEFT JOIN BASSHIPMARK J ON OPOORDER2_M.SHIPMARKID = J.SHIPMARKID ORDER BY BILLDATE DESC,BILLNO DESC

data.name: View_Provider.CommandText
data.value: SELECT OPOORDER2_M.BILLDATE,OPOORDER2_M.BILLNO,OPOORDER2_M.SDTBILLNO,OPOORDER2_M.ISSIGN,OPOORDER2_M.REFBILLNO, OPOORDER2_M.ONHANDDATE,OPOORDER2_M.CUSTID,OPOORDER2_M.CORPMEMO,OPOORDER2_M.PERSONID,OPOORDER2_M.WAREID, OPOORDER2_M.DEPARTMENTID,OPOORDER2_M.PROJECTID,OPOORDER2_M.CONNECTPERSON, OPOORDER2_M.TOTALAMOUNT + OPOORDER2_M.TAXAMOUNT SUMAMOUNT2, A.CORPSHORTNAME ,A.TEL1,B.PERSONCNAME FROM OPOORDER2_M LEFT JOIN BASCUSTOMER A ON OPOORDER2_M.CUSTID = A.CUSTID LEFT JOIN BASPERSON B ON OPOORDER2_M.PERSONID = B.PERSONID ORDER BY OPOORDER2_M.BILLDATE DESC,OPOORDER2_M.BILLNO DESC

data.name: cmdOPO2INV5Query.CommandText
data.value: SELECT A.TYPEFLAG,B.IDNO,A.QUANTITY,ISNULL(X.OPO_QTY,0) AS OPO_QTY,B.BILLDATE,A.BILLNO,A.SEQNO,A.PRODUCTID, B501.PRODCNAME,B501.PRODSTRUCTURE,A.PRICE,A.UNIQUENO,A.WAREID,B.PERSONID,B.CURRENCYID,B.INVOICETYPE, B.TAXCLASS,B.MEMODOC,A.SOURCEBILLNO,A.SOURCEREFBILLNO FROM INVSTKBILL5_D A LEFT JOIN INVSTKBILL5_M B ON A.BILLNO = B.BILLNO LEFT JOIN BASPRODUCT B501 ON A.PRODUCTID = B501.PRODUCTID LEFT JOIN BASCUSTOMER B601 ON B.IDNO = B601.CUSTID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.BILLNO,A.UNIQUENO,SUM(ISNULL(X.QUANTITY,0)) AS OPO_QTY FROM OPOORDER2_D A LEFT JOIN INVSTKBILL5_D X ON A.BILLNO = X.SOURCEBILLNO AND A.UNIQUENO = X.SOURCEUNIQUENO GROUP BY A.BILLNO,A.UNIQUENO ) X ON A.BILLNO = X.BILLNO AND A.UNIQUENO = X.UNIQUENO

data.name: Report.CommandText
data.value: SELECT OPOORDER2_M.*,A.CORPSHORTNAME,A.TEL1 ,B.PERSONCNAME,C.WARECNAME,C.WAREENAME ,D.DEPARTMENTCNAME,D.DEPARTMENTENAME,E.CURRENCYCNAME,E.CURRENCYENAME,F.TAILDESC,G.TAILDESC TAILDESC_G ,H.PERSONCNAME SIGNUSERCNAME,I.PROJ_CNAME,I.PROJ_ENAME,J.SHIPMARKNAME,J.MAINMARK_DOC,J.MAINMARK,J.SIDEMARK_DOC,J.SIDEMARK,J.MEMOCHAR,Z.SEQNO,Z.PRODUCTID,Z.PRODCNAME,Z.PRODENAME,Z.PRODSTRUCTURE,Z.QUANTITY,Z.UNIT,Z.PRICE,Z.TAXPRICE,Z.SUBAMOUNT,Z.TAXAMOUNT,Z.ONHANDDATE,Z.ISNEEDMADE,Z.MEMOCHAR1,Z.ISGIFTPROD,A.CORPCNAME,A.TEL1,A.FAX,G.MEMODOC AS FMEMODOC1,Z1.PERSONCNAME AS SPERSONCNAME,Z.UNIQUENO FROM OPOORDER2_M LEFT JOIN BASCUSTOMER A ON OPOORDER2_M.CUSTID = A.CUSTID LEFT JOIN BASPERSON B ON OPOORDER2_M.PERSONID = B.PERSONID LEFT JOIN BASWAREHOUSE C ON OPOORDER2_M.WAREID = C.WAREID LEFT JOIN BASDEPARTMENT D ON OPOORDER2_M.DEPARTMENTID = D.DEPARTMENTID LEFT JOIN BASCURRENCY E ON OPOORDER2_M.CURRENCYID = E.CURRENCYID LEFT JOIN COMHEADDOC F ON OPOORDER2_M.BILLHEADNO = F.TAILID LEFT JOIN COMTAILDOC G ON OPOORDER2_M.BILLTAILNO = G.TAILID LEFT JOIN BASPERSON H ON OPOORDER2_M.SIGN_USER = H.PERSONID LEFT JOIN PMSPROJECT I ON OPOORDER2_M.PROJECTID = I.PROJECTID LEFT JOIN BASSHIPMARK J ON OPOORDER2_M.SHIPMARKID = J.SHIPMARKID LEFT JOIN OPOORDER2_D Z ON OPOORDER2_M.BILLNO=Z.BILLNO LEFT JOIN BASPERSON Z1 ON OPOORDER2_M.SIGN_USER = Z1.PERSONID ORDER BY BILLDATE,BILLNO
